title: La Discographie des Charlots
description:
LA DISCOGRAPHIE DES CHARLOTS

The description of this torrent is in French because all the music is in this language.

Note: I had to upload it into the "other" category because ortherwise TPB balks at the presence of TXT files (the lyrics)
